article: Hi! My name is Jenny. I am a student in PEP Middle School in Hangzhou. And I have a friend, Bob at school. Do you want to know my family? Here is a photo of my family. These are my grandparents. They live in Shanghai now. This is my father. His name is Bill Smith. He is a teacher in No.4 Middle School. His phone number is 13857428849. This is my mother, Sally Smith. She works in a shop. She only sells rulers, pens, erasers, pencil boxes and notebooks. Her phone number is 15857499256. My mother is tidy, but my father isn't.
questions: Jenny Smith is a student in _ . _
According to the article, we know _ .
options: rulers, pens, erasers, boxes and notebooks_
rulers, pens, erasers, pencils and books_
rulers, pens, erasers, pencil boxes and books_
rulers, pens, erasers, pencil boxes and notebooks
Bill isn't a teacher in school._
Jenny's grandparents are in Hangzhou now._
